## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G45780](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G45780)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>JK224, NPH1, PHOT1, RPT1</u>
- **Gene Name:** NONPHOTOTROPIC HYPOCOTYL 1, phototropin 1, ROOT PHOTOTROPISM 1
- **Description:**   phototropin 1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
